definitions.title: n.pr.pl. gent.,
definitions.body: so most hitherto, and still Mey:Enst. J. 38 ff. (Persians), but many moderns think official title (Hoffm:ZA ii. 54 Marquart:64 Jen:ThLZ, 1895, 509 Ency. Bib. 190 f.; plausible explanations are: Andr:M 53* = As. šuparšaḳ (v. Muss-Arnolt:As. Dict. 1098 šāqū
, general, Id:AJ Sem. Lang. xx (1904), 186 ff.); Scheft:76 = OIran. aparasaraka, lesser ruler;Id:MGWJ 47 (1903), 315 f. expl. [[תְּכָיֵא]]- as Opers. *aparaqrãka, lesser governor).
